column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////I ordered the chili omelette special
column2: which was fluffy and delicious.  The cheddar cheese was fried inside the omelette
column3: then topped with chili and more cheese.  Each omelette is accompanied by hashbrowns or fruit and toast or pancakes.  I got hashbrowns (standard) and pancakes
column4: which were perfect!  I would go back and order them as an entree.  (Small pet peeve: they don't butter the toast for you
column5: which means by the time it hits your table and butter it yourself
column6: it's too cold to melt.  Glad I didn't get the toast)
